location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Richard Thomas Goodwin, Secretary and Translator in the Office of Country Correspondence at Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Richard Thomas Goodwin, Secretary and Translator in the Office of Country Correspondence at Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, transmitting a letter from the Governor to be delivered to Shaikh Kulfan [Shaikh Khalfan], Governor of Useeloo [Bandar-e Asaluyeh], with a packet containing some articles as presents (letter and packet not enclosed).
